title: Brooklyn subway shooting suspect is in custody, set to appear in court Thursday - CNN
content:
1. Brooklyn subway shooting suspect is in custody, set to appear in court Thursday  CNN
  2. Police sources believe Brooklyn subway attack suspect called in tip leading to his own arrest  CBS New York
  3. Brooklyn Subway Shooting Suspect In Custody  NBC News
  4. Brooklyn subway shooting shows utter failure of NYCâ€™s soft-on-crime policies (opinion)  SILive.com
  5. Opinion | Can the Brooklyn subway shooting sober up our politics on crime?  The Washington Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Frank James, the man arrested on suspicion of setting off smoke grenades and shooting 10 people at a Brooklyn subway station Tuesday morning, will make his initial court appearance Thursday, authorities said.
